name: TuberculosisInterferonGammaReleaseAssays
title: Tuberculosis (Interferon Gamma Release Assays)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Mycobacterium tuberculosis stimulated gamma interferon),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Mycobacterium tuberculosis stimulated gamma interferon;  LOINC search: "Mycobacterium tuberculosis stimulated gamma interferon -control -panel -interpretation -avium -bovis"),(Exclusion Criteria: panel control, interpretative tests)
